name: Gone Vroom
description:
"What in the world lol" -- Steve Gaynor, one of the creators of Gone Home

I inexplicably made this for Ludum Dare 41, which used the theme "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres"

My wife and I did the VO.

All assets are either included in Unity's Standard Assets, or bought/downloaded from the app store.

Yes. I actually spent money on this.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrows - Move
  • Left Click - Interact
  • Esc - exit

Royalty Free Music:

  • Opening track - Tomorrow by Bensound
  • Closing track - Slow Motion by Ben Sound

Fonts: 

  •  nevis bold
  • paper daisy
  • REIS
  • Tox Typewriter
